title: tollai tIrkka valla
sahitya:
tollai tIrkka valla deivam illaiyO ulagil


anupallavi

  ellaiyillAk-karuNai enrOr ettarO siddharO Anandap-pittarO


caraNam    appar sambandar atishayamellAm andak-kAla ninaivO
 abhayam tandu nI ANDadellAm arputak-kavikkanavO
tappAda ninnaruL ippAvikkAgavE tanmai izhandu pOmP inda
vanmai enpAl AmO sAmI rAma kAmi enadu
